required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Obese Human Beta-2-adrenergic Stimulation and Muscle Glucose Uptake
clinical_study.official_title: Targeting the Beta-2-adrenergic Pathway to Improve Skeletal Muscle Glucose Uptake in Obese Humans

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of four weeks clenbuterol/placebo supplementation on skeletal muscle glucose disposal in overweight/obese male and (postmenopausal) female volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: insulin-stimulated fluorodeoxyglucose (18F-FDG) uptake in quadriceps muscle.
primary_outcome.description: Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on insulin-stimulated 18F-FDG uptake in quadriceps muscle as assessed using radio-active labelled tracer (18F-FDG) in positron emission tomogaphy magnetic resonance imaging (PET-MRI).

secondary_outcome.description: Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on insulin-stimulated 18F-FDG uptake in BAT as assessed using radio-active labelled tracer (18F-FDG) in PET-MRI.

other_outcome.description: Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on body weight
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on lean mass as assessed by Bodpod measurement
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on fat mass as assessed by Bodpod measurement
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on glucose-infusion rate (GIR) during a one-step hyperinsulinemic-euglycemic clamp
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on plasma insulin concentrations
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on plasma glucose concentrations
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on plasma FFA concentrations
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on plasma (TAG) concentrations
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on heart rate as assessed by means of an automated cuff
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on blood pressure (systolic and diastolic blood pressure) as assessed by means of an automated cuff
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on energy expenditure as measured by indirect calorimetry
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on substrate oxidation as measured by indirect calorimetry
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on sleeping energy expenditure as assessed by means of whole-room indirect calorimetry
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on substrate oxidation during sleep as assessed by means of whole-room indirect calorimetry

Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on skeletal muscle gene expression of insulin signalling and beta-adrenergic pathways as determined in muscle biopsies by means of RT-qPCR

Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on skeletal muscle protein expression of insulin signalling and adrenergic signalling pathways as determined in muscle biopsies by means of Western blot
Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on FMD as assessed by means of echo-doppler

Comparison between prolonged (4 weeks) clenbuterol hydrochloride or placebo supplementation on skeletal muscle GLUT4 translocation as assessed by means of wide-field microscopy in skeletal muscle biopsies

arm_group.description: Subjects will ingest clenbuterol hydrochloride capsules (20 microgram/each) twice daily (40 microgram/day) for a maximum of 28 days. Subjects that received the clenbuterol hydrochloride capsules (at random) in the first study period will receive the placebo capsules during the second study period.

Subjects will ingest placebo capsules matching the clenbuterol hydrochloride capsules one time per day for a maximum of 28 days. Subjects that received the placebo capsules (at random) in the first study period will receive the clenbuterol hydrochloride capsules during the second study period.

intervention.description: Daily ingestion of clenbuterol hydrochloride capsules (40 microgram/day) for a total period of 28 days with a wash-out period of at least 6-8 weeks.
Daily ingestion of placebo capsules for a total period of 28 days with a wash-out period of at least 6-8 weeks.
